RemoteDebug

Initiative to unify remote debugging across browsers.

Tweet Follow @remotedebug

Remote debugging compatibility

To get an overview of the functionality in existing remote debugging protocols, we have started an compatibility chart, where we will try to outline the functionality in each protocol.

API compatibility overview

Area Chrome Firefox Webkit Scope
Console
JavaScript console. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
Debugger
JavaScript debugging capabilities. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
DOM
DOM capabilities. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
DOM Debugger
DOM debugging capabilities. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
Input
Input emulation capabilities. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
Network
Network capabilities. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
Page
Page/App capabilities. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
Runtime
Runtime capabilities. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes
Timeline
Timeline events and instrumentation. 		Yes Yes Yes Yes

Protocol compatibility overview
